title: Modeling Translation
about: Click **Prepare for transcription** to zoom in to cell nucleus and separate DNA strands.
Then click on the **Transcribe** button to trigger complete DNA transcription.
After that you can clikc **Translate** to see amino acids being linked together into a protein.
You can also just proceed step by step using **Proceed one step** button.
**<<** and **>>** buttons can be used to jump quickly between steps.
**Reset** button will bring you back to the beginning.
